name: Dyna Blaster
overview: Dyna Blaster is the alternate/European name for "Bomberman", first released on the TurboGraphx-16 and subsequently on several 16 bit systems and MS-DOS. This Atari version is an adaptation with similar gameplay and graphics made in 2004. Although slightly less colorful the game mechanics remain the same; the player(s) navigate a maze by dropping bombs, avoiding the explosions they cause, and picking up various power ups or abilities the bombs reveal.
